title: Bloomberg Markets: Long Island Honors Independent TV

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Noah Doyle\u0010Founder \u0010North Fork TV Festival\u0010Discussing the North Fork TV Festival celebrating and drawing attention to independent television pilots with actor and festival honoree Chris Noth.
